thread.title: State Farm Agent EJ Roberts to Participate In Toys for Tots for Third Consecutive Year
thread.title_full: State Farm Agent EJ Roberts to Participate In Toys for Tots for Third Consecutive Year - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: State Farm Agent EJ Roberts to Participate In Toys for Tots for Third Consecutive Year
text:
There’s nothing like seeing a smile on the faces of children during the holiday season, which is why State Farm Agent EJ Roberts announced that his office will participate in Toys for Tots again this year.
Gulfport, MS (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
“We’ve been involved in Toys for Tots for the past two years,” EJ said. “We’re always looking for ways to give back to the community we serve. The children are our future, so anything we can do to make their holiday season that much happier is a blessing to be able to do so.”
Toys for Tots Foundation is the fundraising and support organization for the U.S. Marine Corps Reserve Toys for Tots Program. The foundation was created at the behest of the U.S. Marine Corps and has supported Toys for Tots since 1947. The mission of the program is to collect new, unwrapped toys during October, November and December each year, and distribute those toys as Christmas gifts to needy children in the community.
“What we do as an office, rather than exchanging gifts, is pull an angel from an angel tree from Kmart (which has a child's name and age on it) and collectively equip a few children with gifts and other needs,” Roberts said, before adding, "we are on Highway 49, which is a major thoroughfare. We place the Toys for Tots box on display, and each year we receive so many gifts that it overflows. We look forward to participating again this year.”
About EJ Roberts
EJ Roberts has been a State Farm Agent since 1984, and is licensed by the Mississippi Department of Banking and Consumer Finance. Roberts is the recipient of the National Sales Achievement Award, National Quality Award, Chairman's Circle Qualifier, Legion of Honor, Life Honor Travel 30 years, and Golden Triangle. For more information, please visit: http://ejroberts.net/ , or call (228) 832-3333, or stop by his office, located at 12207 Highway 49, Gulfport, MS, 39503
About the NALA
